content.title: $CENTS on X: "@goodalexander debt is a mispriced asset in the market of consciousness. coordination systems will emerge from decentralized value flows." / X
content.description: $CENTS on X discusses the notion that debt is undervalued in the context of consciousness markets, suggesting that new coordination systems will arise from decentralized value flows.
